ticket.title: ASICS changes on admin
ticket.original-body: Admin 1. Change "Create" button => "Save as Draft" when not in publish mode 2. Change "Update" button => "Save changes as Draft" when not in publish mode 3. View/edit list is too long in admin
ticket.latest-body: Admin 1. Change "Create" button => "Save as Draft" when not in publish mode 2. Change "Update" button => "Save changes as Draft" when not in publish mode 3. View/edit list is too long in admin
ticket.original-body-html:
Admin
1. Change "Create" button => "Save as Draft" when not in publish mode
2. Change "Update" button => "Save changes as Draft" when not in publish
mode
3. View/edit list is too long in admin

ticket.title: ASICS changes: Store locator etc.
ticket.original-body:
Mails 1. Change fonts in emails to arial (currently shows up as courier in Lotus notes) 2. Change default sender from: ASICS <online@asics.eu>” but let countries change this in their settings page 3. Currently the default sign at the bottom of each email is ASICS Benelux. Change this to ASICS. Should also be a configuration in settings. 4. Cancellation email not found in /admin/mails (also confirm that all system mails were configured for preview.)
Store Locator 1. Map jumps on store locator after clicking store name 2. ASICS and OTHER ASICS STORES => OTHER RETAIL PARTNERS 3. Is there a reason for the shop order? If not, alphabetize results. 4. What is Alternative name in store admin? 5. What creates the list of categories in the store locator? 6. Stores upload doesn't work well (especially deleting and adding at the same time... Karen reported it took 3 times for it to work)
ticket.latest-body:
Mails 1. Change fonts in emails to arial (currently shows up as courier in Lotus notes) 2. Change default sender from: ASICS <online@asics.eu>” but let countries change this in their settings page 3. Currently the default sign at the bottom of each email is ASICS Benelux. Change this to ASICS. Should also be a configuration in settings. 4. Cancellation email not found in /admin/mails (also confirm that all system mails were configured for preview.)
Store Locator 1. Map jumps on store locator after clicking store name 2. ASICS and OTHER ASICS STORES => OTHER RETAIL PARTNERS 3. Is there a reason for the shop order? If not, alphabetize results. 4. What is Alternative name in store admin? 5. What creates the list of categories in the store locator? 6. Stores upload doesn't work well (especially deleting and adding at the same time... Karen reported it took 3 times for it to work)
ticket.original-body-html:
Mails
1. Change fonts in emails to arial (currently shows up as courier in Lotus notes)
2. Change default sender from: ASICS online@asics.eu” but let countries change this in their settings page
3. Currently the default sign at the bottom of each email is ASICS Benelux. Change this to ASICS. Should also be a configuration in settings.
4. Cancellation email not found in /admin/mails (also confirm that all system mails were configured for preview.)

Store Locator
1. Map jumps on store locator after clicking store name
2. ASICS and OTHER ASICS STORES => OTHER RETAIL PARTNERS
3. Is there a reason for the shop order? If not, alphabetize results.
4. What is Alternative name in store admin?
5. What creates the list of categories in the store locator?
6. Stores upload doesn't work well (especially deleting and adding at the
same time... Karen reported it took 3 times for it to work)

ticket.title: IE>save setting>alway show the ajax loader icon
ASICS changes: Top Navigation, Widgets, SportStyle, AYAMi
ticket.original-body:
Top Navigation 1. Change AYAMI => AYAMi
Widgets 2. Remove store locator widget from all product pages since there is the new store locator lead below the product description
ASICS SportStyle 1.Change line-height on ASICS SportStyle to about 1.0. Keep same space between title and description below. 2.Remove image filter for now. Maybe it will come back in the future.
AYAMi 1. Clicking an AYAMi hotspots click jumps to top of page 2. Change text in the Get Layering section from AYAMI => AYAMi
ticket.latest-body:
Top Navigation 1. Change AYAMI => AYAMi
Widgets 2. Remove store locator widget from all product pages since there is the new store locator lead below the product description
ASICS SportStyle 1.Change line-height on ASICS SportStyle to about 1.0. Keep same space between title and description below. 2.Remove image filter for now. Maybe it will come back in the future.
AYAMi 1. Clicking an AYAMi hotspots click jumps to top of page 2. Change text in the Get Layering section from AYAMI => AYAMi
ticket.original-body-html:
Top Navigation
1. Change AYAMI => AYAMi

Widgets
2. Remove store locator widget from all product pages since there is the new store locator lead below the product description

ASICS SportStyle
1.Change line-height on ASICS SportStyle to about 1.0. Keep same space between title and description below.
2.Remove image filter for now. Maybe it will come back in the future.

AYAMi
1. Clicking an AYAMi hotspots click jumps to top of page
2. Change text in the Get Layering section from AYAMI => AYAMi
